name: tbarthel
body:
# Welcome.
Hi, my name is Thomas Barthélémy. I decided to create this GitHub User Page to introduce myself as well as to present come of my personal projects. Have a good time there (=

***
# About me
Since I was a little boy, I have always been interested in computer science and new technology, not only as a user but also as a developer - all my friends from childhood could tell you. Far away from my first console application in junior school, I am currently studying Computer Engineering at the Université de Technolohie de Compiègne in France. I am specialized in human-computer interface and interaction, software design and knowledge engineering. 
## Experience
Coming soon...
## Education
Coming soon...

***
# Projects
## Android
For three years now, I have worked a lot during my free time to learn Android development. Recently I reached a new step by publishing my first app on the Play Store and I try to take advantage of any opportunity in order to keep improving my skills in this field. Here are some of Android projects I have been working on, from the most recent to the oldest.

### Chase Whisply : an augmented reality open-source project
![Chase Whisply banner](https://github.com/tvbarthel/ChaseWhisplyProject/raw/master/static/banner_chase_whisply.jpg)
"Chase Whisply" turns your smartphone into a gun sight that can reveal ghosts living around you. Your goal is to find them and hunt them! We use Google Play Game Services to provide leaderboards and achievements, and a player profile keeps track of your progress.

Still in beta test, you have to join the [g+ community](https://plus.google.com/communities/104127077976914732043) to become a beta tester. Be sure that we will appreciate every single feedback, especially on the concept.

Feel free to browse the code and contribute to this open-source project :  [Chase Whisply on GitHub](https://github.com/tvbarthel/ChaseWhisplyProject)
